name: Plug The Plug
description:
GamePlay

You play as a plug that has no electricity and you need to find and make your way to the outlet. You do this by using your "professional" parcour skills. The game is located in a room of a house (like a kitchen, a bedroom or even an office). You collect coins to respawn and advance to the next level.

Game features

The game keeps track of coins, time and completed quests. Every level has 3 quests you can complete, every quest has another goal and you get a different amount of points. Some quests you might encounter are:

Quest name
Quest description
The collector
Collect all the coins
The survivor
Do not die
First coin of the game
collect a coin in level 1
Take a shortcut
unlock and use shortcut

All names can change in the game, the names are not final. 

Save system

The last feature the game has, is a full save system. All of your progress will be saved locally on a file, the file will get saved in binary so you do not lose any of the important stuff ;).  The game has settings and these will also get stored locally on your computer but these will not be saved in binary, the settings will make use of Unity's PlayerPrefs.

You can disable the camera rotation by setting the sensitivity to 0.

Can you beat your own scores and reach the end as fast as possible?
